text:
Roman and Andreas little "studio" is lovely. I've been looking for places to stay in Austin for a little and I found everything to be ugly besides this.
Checkin was really easy as the keys were in a lock box. Very nice bathroom and comfortable bed. It sleeps two people very well.

When ever I come back to Austin, I would totally try to stay with Roman and Andrea again.
title: Private Studio in Modern Crash Pad
